channel.title: [Help needed]
channel.description:
[s]Hi all.
First of all, I musr say; this forum rocks, I think it's even better than KaitNieks.
But now what I'm posting about.
I've gor [u]NixScape[/u] and did everything all the tuts say. But when I run 'Run&compile.bat' it says this:
[code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting FusionScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/code]
And then it doenst do anything, so I think I must start up my server with 'runserver.bat' but that gives this:
[code]Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?[/code]
Ehm... that port sure isnt in use.. most ports i use are 4 numbers..
But what now? Do I have to port porward 43594 or something?
Thank you
--~~--EDIT:
Now I downloaded normal WhiteScape, and when I open the Run&compile file there is says this:
[code]The system can't find the submitted path.[/code][/s]
Nevermind, already solved

item.title: [Help needed]
item.dc:creator: @JBX JBX
item.description:
@JBX wrote:

[s]Hi all.

First of all, I musr say; this forum rocks, I think it’s even better than KaitNieks.

But now what I’m posting about.

I’ve gor NixScape and did everything all the tuts say. But when I run ‘Run&compile.bat’ it says this:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting FusionScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

And then it doenst do anything, so I think I must start up my server with ‘runserver.bat’ but that gives this:

Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

Ehm… that port sure isnt in use… most ports i use are 4 numbers…

But what now? Do I have to port porward 43594 or something?

Thank you

–~~–EDIT:

Now I downloaded normal WhiteScape, and when I open the Run&compile file there is says this:

The system can't find the submitted path.

Nevermind, already solved

Read full topic
